definitions.definition: A brake in a vehicle , set by hand, and usually locking on until released by hand, enabling its use when parked .
The mechanism, particularly the locking hand-operated lever or foot-operated toggle lever in a motorcar or the hand-operated crank on a railcar , which is used to set and release such a brake.

main_definition: ( mechanical engineering , automotive , rail transport ) A brake in a vehicle , set by hand, and usually locking on until released by hand, enabling its use when parked .
secondary_definitions: ( mechanical engineering , automotive , rail transport ) The mechanism, particularly the locking hand-operated lever or foot-operated toggle lever in a motorcar or the hand-operated crank on a railcar , which is used to set and release such a brake.
